dict.acceptation: 违背宗教[道德原则]的恶行；罪恶，罪孽；过错，罪过；愚蠢的事，可耻的事；

sent.orig: The fast and accurate evaluation of transcendental functions(e.g.exp,log,sin,tan)is very important in the field of scientific computing.
sent.trans: 科学计算中的许多领域都需要快速而精确地计算超越函数，即exp、log、sin、tan等此类函数。

sent.orig: Catholics go to confession to be purged of sin/purge (away) their sin/purge their souls of sin.
sent.trans: 天主教徒透过告解以获得赦罪[净化灵魂]。

sent.orig: It is no sin to sell dear but a sin to give ill measure.
When the lust conceived it bears sin and the sin, it is full-grown, brings forth death.
sent.trans: 私欲既怀了胎，就生出罪来。罪既成长，就会死去。

sent.orig: Everyone who practices sin practices lawlessness also, and sin is lawlessness.
sent.trans: 4凡犯罪的，也行不法；罪就是不法。
